title: Cute Fitted Henley Top with Lace Hemline
image_prompt: Isolated flat-lay product render of a cute fitted Henley top, solid pastel blush pink color, minimal lace frills along hemline, dainty detailing, high-detail fabric texture, visible stitching and trims, plain white background, no model or mannequin.
neckline: Henley neckline with partial button placket

techpack.construction: double-stitched seams, lace trim attached with narrow hem stitch

provenance.inspiration: Modern romantic casual wear with subtle feminine details

design_text:
